## IProgressHandler.start property

Start this progress bar. After calling it, the progress bar will be seen to users with $<!-- -->{<!-- -->currentStep<!-- -->} = 0 and $<!-- -->{<!-- -->detail<!-- -->} = detail.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start: (detail?: string) => Promise<void>;
```
